Patients receive anti-cytotoxic T-lymphocyte-associated antigen-4 monoclonal antibody IV 90 minute immediately follow gp100:209-217 gp100:280-288 peptide emulsify Montanide ISA-51 subcutaneously day 1 , 22 , 43 , 64 .
